message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $19,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about $12,500?
